mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TA_PRODUCT (PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, NATION_CODE, CITY_CODE, THENUMBER, DEPARTURE_DATE, ARRIVAL_DATE, TRANSPORTATION, THEME, CATEGORIZATION, COSTPRICE, ADULT_PRICE, CHILD_PRICE, BABY_PRICE, ITINERARY, HOTEL_TOUR, OPTIONAL_TOUR, SALES) VALUES(#{PRODUCT_CODE}, #{PRODUCT_NAME}, #{NATION_CODE}, #{CITY_CODE}, #{THENUMBER}, #{DEPARTURE_DATE}, #{ARRIVAL_DATE}, #{TRANSPORTATION}, #{THEME}, #{CATEGORIZATION}, #{COSTPRICE}, #{ADULT_PRICE}, #{CHILD_PRICE}, #{BABY_PRICE}, #{ITINERARY}, #{HOTEL_TOUR}, #{OPTIONAL_TOUR}, #{SALES})
INSERT INTO TA_PROIMG(PROIMG_IDX, ROOT, PRODUCT_CODE) VALUES(IDX_CRE.NEXTVAL, #{ROOT}, LAST_INSERT_ID())
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, NATION_CODE, CITY_CODE, DEPARTURE_DATE, ARRIVAL_DATE, TRANSPORTATION, THEME, COSTPRICE FROM TA_PRODUCT

SELECT p.PRODUCT_CODE, p.PRODUCT_NAME, n.NATION_NAME, c.CITY_NAME, p.THENUMBER, p.DEPARTURE_DATE, p.ARRIVAL_DATE, p.TRANSPORTATION, p.THEME, p.CATEGORIZATION, p.COSTPRICE, p.ADULT_PRICE, p.CHILD_PRICE, p.BABY_PRICE, p.ITINERARY, p.HOTEL_TOUR, p.OPTIONAL_TOUR, p.SALES FROM TA_PRODUCT p , TA_CITY c, TA_NATION n WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = #{code} AND p.CITY_CODE = c.CITY_CODE AND c.NATION_CODE = n.NATION_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE TA_PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{PRODUCT_NAME} WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = #{PRODUCT_CODE}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, NATION_CODE, CITY_CODE, DEPARTURE_DATE, ARRIVAL_DATE, TRANSPORTATION, THEME, COSTPRICE FROM TA_PRODUCT ORDER BY ROWNUM desc LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
